full_description: Use the right arm to pick up the seal and stamp pads {A}, {E}, {C}, {D}, {B}, and {F} twice.
schema: {A} notifies pad 1, {B} notifies pad 2, {C} notifies pad 3, {D} notifies pad 4, {E} notifies pad 5, {F} notifies pad 6, {a} notifies the right arm
preference: No adjectives at the end. Max 15 words. Include {A} through {F} in all. Include {a} in exactly 50% of instructions.
